    EmployeeService, TypicalService<Employee>, Cached
    @Service
public class EmployeeServiceImpl
extends AbstractCachedService<DataJpaEmployeeRepositoryImpl,​Employee>
implements EmployeeService

public Employee create​(Employee employee,

        Creates and saves a given employee in the data base with inserted department and position.
        Specified by:
        create in interface EmployeeService
        Parameters:
        employee - the object to save or update.
        deptId - a department's id, the department will be inserted to the object's department field.

        the created object.

      • update

        @CacheEvict(cacheResolver="cacheResolver",
            allEntries=true)
public void update​(Employee employee,
                   int deptId,
                   int positionId)
            throws NotFoundException
        Updates an existing in the data base employee with inserted department and position.
        Specified by:
        update in interface EmployeeService
        Parameters:
        employee - the object to save or update.
        deptId - a department's id, the department will be inserted to the object's department field.
        positionId - a position's id, the position will be inserted to the object's position field.
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if there aren't updated object in the data base.
